00028 void FileWriter::WriteToHTML(MetricCalculator metricCalculatorObject,string prefix){
00029         Evaluator evaluatorObject = metricCalculatorObject.getEvaluatorObject();
00030         int countMs = evaluatorObject.getCountMs();
00031         int countGt = evaluatorObject.getCountGt();
00032         double** resultOverlap = metricCalculatorObject.getResultOverlap();
00033         double** result_gt = metricCalculatorObject.getResultGtMetrics();
00034         double** result_ms = metricCalculatorObject.getResultMsMetrics();
00035         stringstream filename;
00036 
00037         filename.str("");
00038         filename.clear();
00039         filename << "../src/brics_3d/algorithm/segmentation/evaluation/data/" << prefix <<".html";
00040         ofstream result_stream;
00041         result_stream.precision(5);
00042         result_stream.open(filename.str().c_str(), ios::out);
00043         cout<< filename.str() <<"\n Wrting Success(0/1): "<<result_stream.is_open()<<endl;
00044         result_stream.clear();
00045         result_stream << "<b>Overlap Confusion Matrix:</b><p style=\"clear:both\"> <i>Every cell gives the percentage of overlap between the intersecting Ground Truth and Machine Segmented Regions</i></p>" <<endl;
00046         //Overlap Confusion Matrix
00047         result_stream << "<table border=\"1\" align = center>" <<endl;
00048         result_stream << "<tr>"<<endl;
00049         result_stream << "<td>" << " "  << "</td>" <<endl;
00050         for(int j =0; j<(countMs); j++) {
00051                 result_stream << "<td><b>" << "MS_Region" << j+1 << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00052         }
00053         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Unlabelled" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00054         result_stream << "</tr>"<<endl;
00055 
00056         for (int i =0; i<(countGt+1); i++) {
00057                 result_stream << "<tr>"<<endl;
00058                 if ( i < countGt){
00059                         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "GT_Region" << i+1 << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00060                 } else {
00061                         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Unlabelled" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 int total_points=0;
00065 
00066                 for (int x=0; x<countMs+1; x++){
00067                         total_points += resultOverlap[i][x];
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 double percent=0.0,temp_a;
00071 
00072 
00073                 for(int j =0; j<(countMs+1); j++) {
00074                         temp_a = resultOverlap[i][j];
00075                         percent = temp_a/total_points;
00076                         result_stream << "<td>" << fixed << percent <<"</td>" <<endl;
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 result_stream << "</tr>"<<endl;
00080         }
00081 
00082         result_stream << "</table>" <<endl;
00083 
00084 
00085         //Writing GT-region based evaluation metrics
00086         result_stream << "<BR>&nbsp;<BR><BR>&nbsp;<BR><BR>&nbsp;";
00087         result_stream << "<b>GT Region based metrics:</b>";
00088         result_stream <<"<p style=\"clear:both\"> <i>";
00089         result_stream <<"Every cell gives the value of the evaluation metric for the corresponding GT Region. </i></p>" <<endl;
00090         result_stream << "<table border=\"1\"  align = center>" <<endl;
00091 
00092         result_stream << "<tr>"<<endl;
00093         result_stream << "<td>" << " "  << "</td>" <<endl;
00094         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Occupancy of the region (%)" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00095         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Correct detection (%)" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00096         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "No of Oversegmented Regions" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00097         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Oversegmentation (%)" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00098         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Non-Classification (%)" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00099         result_stream << "</tr>"<<endl;
00100 
00101         for (int i =0; i<(countGt); i++) {
00102 
00103                 result_stream << "<tr>"<<endl;
00104                 result_stream << "<td><b>" << "GT_Region" << i+1 << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00105 
00106                 for(int j =0; j<metricCalculatorObject.getNoOfMetricsGt(); j++) {
00107                         result_stream << "<td>" <<fixed<<result_gt[i][j]<<"</td>" <<endl;
00108                 }
00109 
00110                 result_stream << "</tr>"<<endl;
00111         }
00112 
00113 
00114         result_stream << "</table>"<<endl;
00115         //Writing MS region based metrics
00116         result_stream << "<BR>&nbsp;<BR><BR>&nbsp;<BR><BR>&nbsp;";
00117         result_stream <<"<b>MS Region based metrics:</b>";
00118         result_stream <<"<p style=\"clear:both\"> <i>";
00119         result_stream <<"Every cell gives the value of the evaluation metric for the corresponding MS Region. </i></p>" <<endl;
00120 
00121         result_stream << "<table border=\"1\" align = center >" <<endl;
00122 
00123         result_stream << "<tr>"<<endl;
00124         result_stream << "<td>" << " "  << "</td>" <<endl;
00125         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Occupancy of the region (%)" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00126         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Wrong Classification (%)" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00127         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "No of Undersegmented Regions" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00128         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Undersegmentation (%)" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00129         result_stream << "<td><b>" << "Noise-Classification (%)" << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00130         result_stream << "</tr>"<<endl;
00131 
00132         for (int i =0; i<(countMs); i++) {
00133 
00134                 result_stream << "<tr>"<<endl;
00135                 result_stream << "<td><b>" << "MS_Region" << i+1 << "</b></td>" <<endl;
00136 
00137                 for(int j =0; j<metricCalculatorObject.getNoOfMetricsMs(); j++) {
00138                         result_stream << "<td>" <<fixed<<result_ms[i][j]<<"</td>" <<endl;
00139                 }
00140 
00141                 result_stream << "</tr>"<<endl;
00142         }
00143 
00144         result_stream << " </table> <BR>&nbsp;<BR><BR>&nbsp;<BR><BR>&nbsp;"<<
00145                         "For metric definitions see <b>\"EvaluationMetrics.pdf\"</b> in\""<<
00146                         "\"trunk/src/evaluation\"";
00147         result_stream.close();
00148 }

00150 void FileWriter::WriteToCsv(MetricCalculator metricCalculatorObject,string prefix){
00151         stringstream filename;
00152         Evaluator evaluatorObject = metricCalculatorObject.getEvaluatorObject();
00153         int countMs = evaluatorObject.getCountMs();
00154         int countGt = evaluatorObject.getCountGt();
00155         double** resultOverlap = metricCalculatorObject.getResultOverlap();
00156         double** resultGt = metricCalculatorObject.getResultGtMetrics();
00157         double** resultMs = metricCalculatorObject.getResultMsMetrics();
00158         ofstream result_stream;
00159 
00160         //writing overlap matrix
00161         filename.str("");
00162         filename.clear();
00163         filename<< "../src/brics_3d/algorithm/segmentation/evaluation/data/"<<prefix<<"_overlapMatrix.csv";
00164         result_stream.precision(5);
00165         result_stream.open(filename.str().c_str(), ios::out);
00166         cout<< filename.str() <<"\n Wrting Success(0/1): "<<result_stream.is_open()<<endl;
00167         result_stream.clear();
00168 
00169         for(int i=0; i<countGt; i++){
00170                 result_stream << endl;
00171                 for(int j =0; j<countMs; j++){
00172                         if(j!=countMs-1) {
00173                                 result_stream<<fixed<<resultOverlap[i][j]<<",";
00174                         }else{
00175                                 result_stream<<fixed<<resultOverlap[i][j];
00176                         }
00177                 }
00178         }
00179 
00180         result_stream.close();
00181 
00182         //Writing GT based metrics
00183         filename.str("");
00184         filename.clear();
00185         filename<< "../src/brics_3d/algorithm/segmentation/evaluation/data/"<<prefix<<"_GtMetrics.csv";
00186         result_stream.precision(5);
00187         result_stream.open(filename.str().c_str(), ios::out);
00188         cout<< filename.str() <<"\n Wrting Success(0/1): "<<result_stream.is_open()<<endl;
00189         result_stream.clear();
00190 
00191         for(int i=0; i<countGt; i++){
00192 
00193                 for(int j =0; j<metricCalculatorObject.getNoOfMetricsGt(); j++){
00194                         if(j!=metricCalculatorObject.getNoOfMetricsGt()-1) {
00195                                 result_stream<<fixed<<resultGt[i][j]<<",";
00196                         }else{
00197                                 result_stream<<fixed<<resultGt[i][j];
00198                         }
00199                 }
00200                 result_stream << endl;
00201         }
00202 
00203         result_stream.close();
00204 
00205         //Writing GT based metrics
00206         filename.str("");
00207         filename.clear();
00208         filename<< "../src/brics_3d/algorithm/segmentation/evaluation/data/"<<prefix<<"_MsMetrics.csv";
00209         result_stream.precision(5);
00210         result_stream.open(filename.str().c_str(), ios::out);
00211         cout<< filename.str() <<"\n Wrting Success(0/1): "<<result_stream.is_open()<<endl;
00212         result_stream.clear();
00213 
00214         for(int i=0; i<countMs; i++){
00215 
00216                 for(int j =0; j<metricCalculatorObject.getNoOfMetricsMs(); j++){
00217                         if(j!=metricCalculatorObject.getNoOfMetricsMs()-1) {
00218                                 result_stream<<fixed<<resultMs[i][j]<<",";
00219                         }else{
00220                                 result_stream<<fixed<<resultMs[i][j];
00221                         }
00222                 }
00223                 result_stream << endl;
00224         }
00225 
00226         result_stream.close();
00227 
00228 
00229 }
